twilio#accept_callback.response_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Response><Say>Thank you, our staff will call you as soon as possible. Goodbye.</Say><Hangup/></Response>

twilio#call_fallback.response_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Response><Say>Unfortunately there is some issue with connecting to Goodcity. Please try again after some time. Thank you.</Say><Hangup/></Response>

twilio#hold_gc_donor.title: Caller waiting in queue for less than 30 seconds
twilio#hold_gc_donor.response_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Response><Say>Hello Chauncey Schulist,</Say><Say>Thank you for calling GoodCity.HK, operated by Crossroads Foundation. Please wait a moment while we try to connect you to one of our staff.</Say><Play>http://test.host/api/v1/twilio/hold_music</Play></Response>

twilio#hold_gc_donor.title: Caller waiting in queue for more than 30 seconds

twilio#voice.title: Active Donor calling to Goodcity
twilio#voice.response_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Response><Enqueue workflowSid="csdb5bea9nxcbxb0299c9668bvcc534" waitUrl="/api/v1/hold_gc_donor" waitUrlMethod="post"><TaskAttributes>{"selected_language":"en","user_id":20633}</TaskAttributes></Enqueue><Gather numDigits="1" timeout="3" action="/api/v1/accept_callback"><Say>Unfortunately it none of our staff are able to take your call at the moment.</Say><Say>You can request a call-back without leaving a message by pressing 1.</Say><Say>Otherwise, leave a message after the tone and our staff will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.</Say></Gather><Record maxLength="60" playBeep="true" action="/api/v1/send_voicemail"/></Response>

twilio_outbound#completed_call.title: When call completed between Admin and Donor
When call to Donor is failed, not-answered or busy.
twilio_outbound#completed_call.response_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Response><Say>Couldn't reach Monserrat Boyle try again soon. Goodbye.</Say><Hangup/></Response>
